casebody.data:
CARDIORENTIS AG
v.
IQVIA LTD. and Iqvia RDS, Inc. 168A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2019 J. Dickson Phillips, III, Attorney at Law, Jonathan C. Krisko, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Cardiorentis AG. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, Shepard D. O'Connell, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Iqvia Ltd. and Iqvia RDS, Inc.

*206The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of June 2019 by Plaintiff to admit Catherine E. Stetson Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2019."
